data.title: Argentina - High Volume Dove Shooting - 5 Days - Including Cartridges - £5400
data.text:
Day 1 – Arrival:

You will be collected from Ingeniero Aeronáutico Ambrosio L.V. Taravella International Airport (AKA Pajas Blancas) . The drive takes roughly three and a half hours with a rest break at a service station halfway.

Day 2 to 5 – Shooting:

Morning

07:00 – Breakfast at La Quinta Lodge – We will start the day with North American and Argentinian breakfast buffet that includes coffee, milk, fresh juice, yogurt, cereal, fruit, toast, cake, homemade marmalades, ham, cheese, bacon and eggs

08:00 – Drive to the shooting grounds

08:30 – Start Shooting

11:00 – Rest break with fruit, cereal and drinks

11:30 Continue shooting

Afternoon

13:00 – Stop for a traditional ‘Argentine asado’ (barbeque) and a ‘siesta’ (nap) may be offered

14:00 – Continue shooting until sunset

Evening

19:00 – Return to the lodge for cocktails, appetizers and an early dinner

Day 6 – Departure:

You will be collected from the lodge and driven Ingeniero Aeronáutico Ambrosio L.V. Taravella International Airport (AKA Pajas Blancas) . The drive takes roughly three and a half hours with a rest break at a service station halfway.

Description

Based in Merol, in the Conlara Valley at the foot of The Comechingones Mountain Range, on the border of the Cordboa region, La Quinta Lodge is perfectly positioned under the busiest dove migration routes and offers a variety of shooting situations including: flighting, roost shooting, and decoying.

The high concentration of doves and pigeons as well as the unbeatable weather conditions make Merlo one of the best places in the world to shoot of both species.

You will be shooting at the best migratory routes. These are found near lowland forests or around our exclusive area of peanut, corn and soybean crops with pivot irrigation. The dove hunting season is open all year. Guests can expect to shoot as many shots as their shoulder can tolerate, and still have thousands of doves flying over them.

Also Included

Daily maid service (from 8 a.m. to 1 p.m.)

24-hour reception (with prior notice if the check-in is after 9:00 pm)

2 uncovered heated pools (heated November to March) with waterfalls

1 uncovered heated children’s pool (November to March)

1 indoor heated pool with waterfall and views of the mountains (open all year)

1 indoor Jacuzzi 9’ x 9’ also with views (for adults) (open all year)

Indoor pool area includes restroom, changing rooms and shower

Poolside BBQ and outside Bar

1 free bag of firewood included with each cabana

Club house

Gym (treadmill, weights, spinning bike) with poolside views and air conditioning

Game room with Ping Pong, foosball and a children’s game and drawing area

Beach volleyball court

Tennis court

Soccer Field

Bocci Ball and Tejo court

9 hole Frisbee / Disc golf course

Outdoor Log playground for children

Recommendations for hiking, excursions and horseback riding.

Recreation for children with specialized personnel (in High Season)

Safe in all cabins

Massage Room: Massages and beauty treatments available on request

Bar service: smoothies, drinks, daiquiris, fruit salad, toast, pizza, pork and beef sandwiches, croissants with ham and cheese, soft drinks, fresh squeezed juices (9 a.m. to 9 p.m.)
